comment.author: 18901029@N00
comment._content:
The music on the back of the cornet play on the right's lyre is Goodnight Sweetheart (the title can be read on the photo at the persistant URL). This was a hit for Guy Lombardo and his Royal Canadians in December 1931, so from the date mentioned in the data on the Powerhouse Museum's site of 1932, the band was playing the current hits of the time.
Jack Greaves who now lives around Cowra may be able to identify the band or some of the people.
